DOC.brief_title: Development Intravitreal Ranibizumab Determining Pathogenesis Macular Edema With Retinal Vein Occlusion
DOC.detailed_description: Methodology : Aqueous humor sample ( 0.1ml ) obtain intravitreous injection ranibizumab measure level cytokine . Targeted cytokine follow ; IL-1 , IL-2 , IL-6 , IL-8 , IL-9 , IL-10 , IL-12 , IL-13 , IP-10 , MCP-1 , MMP-1 , MIP-1β , PDGF , VEGF , PlGF , ICAM-1 , TNF-α , RANTES , VEGFR-1 , VEGFR-2 , report expression level increase macular edema associate RVO . Cytokines measure multiple ELISA ( Luminex ) . Aqueous humor sample obtain manner patient recur first injection continuous monthly injection . Statistical analysis conduct examine difference cytokine level early late/incomplete responder ranibizumab , predict number injection stabilize cytokine level . Number center & patient : Single center , 100 patient Sample size justification : Sample size calculation do , since study single-arm , observational study . Population : Inclusion criterion : patient RVO macular edema
DOC.criteria: Foveal thickness > 300 μm Best correct visual acuity < 20/30 History retinal disease BRVO , glaucoma , uveitis , diabetes mellitus , rubeosis iridis , ocular infection , laser photocoagulation , intraocular surgery
